content: hey everyone bill here Ryan and I are very excited to be moving forward with
the first expansion content for our line of Tru tiles 3d printed dungeon tile
model files we're trying to do chasms and water pools we're targeting for each
of those packs have something around 30 models so just as we did with the base
set our goal is to bring you extremely good value for your dollar if you are an
early adopter of true tiles or if you've never heard of it now is the perfect
time to go ahead and check out the Kickstarter link in the description
below and for now I'm just going to go ahead and copy paste in the promo video
associated with the Kickstarter I'm wild Locke thanks for joining me and I'll see
you next time a few months ago we released the true tiles base dungeon
pack and it's done well many out there are enjoying the mathematical advantages
that set our tiles apart from all others if you're not familiar with true tiles
you can check out the original launch promo video below but now the time has
come to launch the first two expansion packs in the first pack chasms you'll
receive the model files for 24 chasm tiles plus a number of bridge options
for hundreds of different configurations cracks crevices fissures chasms rings of
soft-landing will never have seemed so valuable before the second expansion
pack water will allow you to add pools lakes and rivers to your dungeons this
pack contains 27 water tiles along with a couple of boats bridges and waterfall
create large lakes with islands or winding rivers paint them differently to
make acid or lava pools during the course of this Kickstarter will be
working on designing a number of new tiles to offer you in the form of
stretch goals and all pledge levels will receive them we've got some ideas to
make your dungeon designs even more interesting such as large curves or
pentagonal rooms but that's just the tip of the iceberg and if you missed out on
the initial release of true tiles don't worry now's the time to hop on board and
grab all the sets if you already purchase the base set you can simply
back the expansion packs we appreciate your support and we're excited to bring
you our first expansion content for true tiles
you
